1113.content: My name is Noah. I'm ten years old and for most of my life I've been on the run and I don't know why. One day I ended up at an orphanage. Some of the kids want to leave and are eager to meet a family who will love and care for them. But I'm not like that. I've been on my own for so long I never really needed the care of a mother or the discipline of a father. Until Today when I meet my new family!
1113.title: My Name is Noah

choices: A worker comes in with the paperwork
11131.content:
I Wake up and walk out of my room. I'm so groggy I wobble trying to get to the bathroom. I see my best friend Joy. "Good Morning Noah"! Joy screamed. "Hey Joy"! I replied. For as long I've known Joy she has always lived up to her name. "Did you know someone's getting adopted today?" Joy asked. "No... Who?" You ask. "I don't know? I just heard about it this morning. After you get ready meet me in the dining room".
"Okay". You reply.
I finish showering, brushing my hair and teeth I head back to my room. I put on a grey tee-shirt, blue jeans, socks, and black sneakers. As I walk out of my room and see a worker before me. She pulls me aside and tells me. "After breakfast come to the office with your belongings! We have some people we would like you to meet"! I go down to the dining room and meet Joy by the doorway. I sit next to her and everyone starts to eat. After breakfast I call Joy and tell her. "I think I'm the one who's getting adopted". "What really that's great isn't it". I shrug. "I guess". "What's wrong"? Joy asks. "I've just never really felt like I needed parents or anyone" I reply. "Don't say that. Your always going need someone. Like me"! She said with a big smile on her face. A smile then ran across my face. "Thanks Joy"!
You run up to your room and start packing. Once I finished I walk to the office door with my belongings. I open the door and see two Charizards. They were lean but well-built and tall. The first one wore a regular white tee-shirt, jeans, and flipflops. The other one wore a sun dress and flipflops as well. I walked in and introduced myself. "Hello, My name is Noah". The one in the sun dress response. "It's nice to meet you Noah! My name is Rose and this is my husband Jon. We're really looking forward to getting to know you"!
11131.title: Meeting my new parents

111312.content: When we finished introducing ourselves to each other. One of the workers walked in with papers in her hand. "It looks like we just introduced ourselves". The worker said. "I just need you to sign a couple papers and your all set". Jon started on the paper work. I then say. "I'm going to tell my friend goodbye". "Okay". Rose replies with a smile. I then walk out of the office and see Joy by the entrance. I walk up to her and hear her say. "I'm going to miss you Noah"! Tears started to run down her face. I embrace her in a hug. "I... I'm going to miss you too Joy"! I let her go and say. "But I know we will run into each other in the future. I know we will so just wait for me". As soon as I finish my sentence Rose and Jon walk out of the office with the worker. "Are we all set". Rose asked. "Yeah". I replied. "Goodbye Joy". I then left the building with Rose and Jon. I got into their car and we drove off. I looked back at the building that use to be my home. Now I have a new home, a new family, and a fresh start. I wonder what's in store for me?
111312.title: A New Home, A New Family, A Fresh Start

11131211.content:
We arrive to a new home. The exterior of the house seems unoriginal like every house on the block. A white, two-story home. Shade from large trees, and dappled sunlight shown through cracks between leaves, were casted upon the newly paved street. Jon pulls up to the driveway, and parks the car. I exit the car and walk around the broad, lush green yard. Everything I saw looked new.
"Noah, come and get your bags." Rose spoke. I make my way back to the car and retrieve my two bags. I carry my bag and myself to the door. we walk in. I saw two 8-foot doorways on my left and right, a staircase on the left wall, and a hallway with two doors on the left and a doorway on the right end of the hall.
" We'll show you to your room." Jon said. We make our way upstairs. Then turn right to the end of the hall. Rose opens the door on the left and we enter. I roam around the cool, blue room. The bed was in the corner on the left with a nightstand next to it. left to the bed was the closet. on the right side of the room were windows, a tv stand with the tv, and a desk up against the window." We'll leave you to unpack. Don't hesitate to ask for anything." Rose said. They left and I began to unpack. I hung up some shirts and pants in the closet. Then shelved some books. It wasn't a lot. I never had a lot of anything, out there in the world or the orphanage. It took me about 5 to 10 minutes put everything I had away. "So, this is it." I thought to my self. I sat at the desk. I opened and closed drawers, of the desk, checking if there was anything in them. I got up, and went downstairs running into...
11131211.title: Home

111312111.content: "Jack, Monica... we'd like to introduce you to Noah, he will be staying with us." Rose spoke as I walked downstairs. I got nervous, and saw two young, athletic looking charizards. I expected them to be charmeleons. It felt like they were glaring at me, but their stares didn't seem to have interest in them, it looked like they never care. "I shouldn't get in their way." I thought to myself. Keeping my composure, a "Hi" left my mouth as I looked up at them, "man, they're tall." I thought to myself. "Hey, kid." Jack spoke, "mom, dad, I'll be heading to my room." Jack walked past me and upstairs to his room. "Nice to meet you Noah" Monica said plainly, "hey mom, dad, I'll be going over a friends, is that okay?" "Sure" both Jon and Rose reply, Jon added, "Be back by dinner, Okay!" Monica walks out the door. "I finished unpacking, Sir, Ma'am." I stated. "That's great, relax and make yourself at home, I'll get started on dinner." Rose replied. I walk back up to my room, and sat at my desk. I pulled out papers and pencils, and began doodling. "Hey kid bro, whatcha doing." Jack spoke as he stood in the doorway. "Oh hey, I'm doodling" I replied. "Cool, I'm heading out to meet with some friends, you want to come with." he said, but I can feel some type of intent coming from him. "Oh, thanks, but I'll have to pass on that." I tried to respectfully decline, but he kept insisting. Then Jon came out of nowhere, "you should go with your brother Noah. It's important socialize outside the house." "Fine" I replied, know something shady might happen, might as well get it over with. I get up and leave the house with Jack. We both get to a park nearby, and meet up with some of his friends.

11512221211.content:
Sleep was always a hard thing for you to come out of. That's why, when the fire started, and everyone evacuated, you didn't get up. Thankfully for you, someone had been watching the whole thing go down. Someone brave...

They dashed into the inferno, electricity coursing though their body as they crashed though walls, reaching the room where you slept. With a heavy sigh, they grabbed you and pulled you along, narrowly escaping the burning building...

You would wake up a long time later. Your whole body was sore, and your lungs felt so inflamed. Looking around with sore, red eyes, you had no idea where you where, but you did see something that made you shiver... It was a news report, of your apartment... On fire, and collapsing... Wordless, you watched before suddenly you felt someone sit at your feet. Looking down on the bed you lay on, you see her.

A rather tall Luxray anthro. She watched the news report, seemingly unaware that you were awake. She was absolutely taller than you were, maybe around 8 feet tall. She had a very pretty look, nice wide hips, long smooth legs and a nice chest to. Her eyes finally flicked over you, and a smile came over her face.

"Someone's a heavy sleeper... I thought you might be dead, if you didn't snore like that." She said, a bit of a grin planted on her.

You blink a bit, and tried to sit up, but a groan escapes your lips, and you fall back into bed.

"Hey hey hey, take it easy. You're not gonna be able to move much for a while. You got pretty badly burned, you know?"

You tried to speak, but with your throat so pained, it was just not going to happen right now, so you just nodded a bit and lay back.

"Heheh" She giggled. "So then..."
11512221211.title: A day you can't forget.

A very excited, young Buizel comes running at you very quickly and accidentally bundles you over, you think to yourself, "gee the little fella is full of energy", the Buizel gets up and dusts himself down.

"Hiiii!!" the small Buizel says enthusiastically, helping you back to your feet. "Whats your name? I'm Zach by the way!"
"Umm I'm (your name), it's a pleasure to meet my new little brother for the first time" you say nervously.
"B-big brother?" he ponders, and his eyes light up and he begins to cry, causing Dad to come in.
"What the hell did you to you do to Zach?" he says angrily.
"No dad! It's ok... I've finally got a big brother!" he cries happily and hugs you tight, the warm hug feels so nice and you can't help but hug your little brother who sighs in content.
"Oh... Ok Zach. If you hurt him, even one little hair on his body... I'll kick you back to the orphanage you got that?" dad says threateningly.
"Yes dad. I understand." you say, rubbing the back of your little bros head, who is now sleeping on your chest, sucking his thumb. "awww... He's so cute when he sleeps dad"

Your new mother comes in and stands at the doorway, looking at you holding her baby Buizel. "So how's our new son honey?" she asks, as you give her Zach gently. "our little Zach always wanted a big brother, and you're finally his dream come true. You do know he's going to look up at you for inspiration, guidance and friendship whenever he's here at home and out and about?" she happily says, rubbing the back of your little bro.
"Yes mum. I completely understand my duties as a big brother. I'll protect Zach with my life! I promise that." you say, hugging your new mother affectionately.
"Good. I'm glad to hear that son," she says, kissing the top of your head lovingly.

You say to your new parents, "I think I'm going to love staying here mum and dad!"

"well I hope so. And so does my wife." dad says, taking you into a warm embrace. You don't feel any shame in saying that you love your new pokemon family, in fact you embrace the fact that you live with a family of Buizels and Floatzel parents.

After a few hours...

1323.content: For future reference, is there anything unusual about you?
1323.title: Teenager

13231.content:
You lay back on your bed in the orphanage that you have lived in since you were six. Your reading one of the only fiction books you could find in the dingy, old place. While the building could use some touching up, you really couldn't complain about the people. There were nice enough to not bother you with tasks that were important. You rarely get any sleep. This leaves you tired and unable to stay focused at most times.

"(IYNH), good news," says on of the care takers says has she comes in. "A family wants to adopt you."

"Really?" you ask, raising an eyebrow as you look over your book at her. You knew from when you got here that there were slim chances that you would get adopted, you accepted that a long time ago. However, learning that a family actually wanted to adopt you was a bit unexpected.

"Yep," she says, smiling warmly. "They want me to drive you out to their house though. Said something about a surprise."

Over the next half hour, you gather your things and say your goodbyes. The caretaker that gave you the news drives you out to the house.

"Have a good life, kid," she says, as she drops you off in front of a mansion an hour later. It's in a secluded area. Far away from any towns or neighbors, and surrounded by trees. Just the way you like it.

"I think it's getting better already," you reply. "Thanks for everything."

You begin to walk up to the front door with your suitcase in your hand. You knock on the door when you reach it and a ___________ opens it.
13231.title: The Unusual Teen

132311.content:
You see a lucario answer the door. The lucario has blue ears, arms, around it's upper thighs. It's dog like legs, feet, part of it's paws, and ears; that are behind it's head; are black. It has red eyes and fur covering it's chest. The most dominant, and the one that makes you a little nervous, is the spike on the back of it's paws and chest. This tells you that it is a male.

"Welcome to your new home, son," the lucario said, shaking your hand. "I know that it will take a while for you to begin to trust us, so I won't force it on you. I'll wait till your ready."

"Thank you, sir," you respond, smiling a half smile.

"But I can't say that my wife will do the same," he says, releasing your hand. "She's a very affectionate person and is very eager for us to have an addition to our family."

"Thanks for the warning," you reply. Your smile drops when you think of the trouble you can cause this family. "Sir, I feel obligated to tell you that there is not much that is normal about me. That there might be a day where your family might be in danger because of me."

"I know," he said, you follow him into the house and he closes the door behind you. "When that time comes, I'm sure that you would've told us why and we'll be prepared for it."

"You really think that?" you ask, wondering if he already knows your secret.

"Yeah," he said. "God created you to feel. It's only a matter of time before you spill your guts, so to say."

"I guess," you say, tring not to let your pain show.

"Let's get you unpacked then," your dad says, "before your new mom gets home form the store."
---------------------------------------------------------------------------- ----------

1323112.title: Younger Sibling

13231121.content:
A very excited, very energetic riolu accidentally bundles over you.

"Hiya," the riolu says, enthusiastically. "My name's Zack. What's your's?"

"Uh, I'm (IYNH)," you say, as he helps you up. Now on your feet you get a good look at the little ball of energy. Other than being a few feet smaller than his lucario parents, and missing the spikes and fur, the only differences is that his ears are on the side of his head and he has silver bumps on his forearms. You begin to get nervous; you were never good with children. Most of them were afraid of you, for some reason. Still, you want to be on good terms with this little kid.

"It's a pleasure to meet my new little brother," you say, as you smile gently.

"B-big brother?" he ponders, and his eyes light up and he begins to cry; which causes your new father, his name is Mark,to come into the room.

"What the hell did you to you do to Zack?" he says angrily.

"No dad! It's ok... I've finally got a big brother!" he cries happily and hugs you tight. It's been so long since someone ever showed you that they cared, that you forgot what it felt like to have your heart melt. You can't help but hug him back. He sighs in content when you do.

"Oh... Ok Zack. If you hurt him, even one little hair on his body... I'll kick you back to the orphanage. You got that?" dad says threateningly.

"Yes, sir. Understood." you say, rubbing the back of your little bros head, who is now sleeping on your chest, sucking his thumb. You can't blame him for being protective of his son.

Your new mother comes in and stands at the doorway, looking at you holding her baby riolu. "So how's our new son honey?" she asks, as you give her Zach gently. "Our little Zack always wanted a big brother, and you're finally his dream come true. You do know he's going to look up at you for inspiration, guidance and friendship whenever he's here at home and out and about?" she happily says, rubbing the back of your little bro.

"Yeah," you reply. "I understand my duties as an older brother and will carry them out even if it causes me my life."

"Good," your mother says. "Now come here." She hugs you affectionately. It feels warm and human, but it caught you off guard and you begin to blush. Your dad takes the chance to hug you. You haven't even been here an hour and you already love it here.

Later...

"What?" you say, a little shocked. Then think back to when you think back to when Mendi said that Zack would depend on you for protection. "Makes sense now," you think out loud.

"What does?" Mark asks, looking confused.

"I was just thinking about when Men... mom said that Zack would depend on me for protection," you answer, blushing a bit at calling Mendi "mom." "It makes sense now."

"I bet it does," Mark says. "Now, pokemon have different rules than humans. First of all, the people at school are very lenient with fighting. however, in this house, fighting is..."

"A last option and should only be used as a means of defense, right?" you guess at the ending of his statement.

"Um... Yeah," Mark says, caught off guard by your understanding of his rules. "So if i find out you get in a fight..."

"You will learn that it was a last resort and the person was not killed," You say. "You have my word."

"And can I trust your word?" Mark says, jokingly. However, trust is a serious matter for you, so you can't really joke about it.

"My word is basically the only thing that is truly mine," you respond. "So, with this knowledge, weather you can trust it or not is up to you. Just know that I don't hand my word out very often."

"Via your reaction, I can tell trust is very important to you, right?" Mark asks, understandingly. You just nod. "Good. We made sure that Zack knows that lying is very wrong, under any circumstance."

"Alright, who's ready for a movie?" Mendi says, walking into the living room while carrying Zack.

"Me!" Zack yells, happily waving his hands over his head. You can't help but smile at his innocence.

Zack sits next to you on the sofa while Mendi sits on the other side of him, after putting in the movie. You notice that it's a Disney movie. While your only watching to spend time with your new family, Zack seems to be really caught up in the movie. So much so that he doesn't notice that he's sucking on his thumb again.

"Zack, what did I say about sucking on your thumb?" Mark says, kindly but stern. You begin to feel confused at this.

"That my thumb is full of germs that can make me sick," Zack says, looking sad. "But--"

"No, 'buts' young man," Mendi says, has she pops a pacifier in Zack's mouth. Zack looks down in shock and blushes bright red in embarrassment. You can tell that he didn't want you to know that he acts very babyish. You can tell that this isn't the first time that he acted like this as well.

Wanting to make him feel better, you but your arm around him and pull him against you. He looks up at you, still blushing a bit. You smile at him and his blush fades entirely. He leans into you side and starts to, unconsciously, suck on his pacifier. All of you go back to watching the movie after wards.

13231121112111111121.content:
The movie finished like every other Disney movie. The protagonists defeating the antagonists and they live happily ever after. You can't help but chuckle at how cheesy it is.

That's when you notice that Zack's breathing has slowed. You look at him out of curiosity. He has his head buried into your chest and is still sucking on the pacifier.

"How long has he been asleep?" you ask, realizing that you didn't notice when he fell asleep.

"About half way through the movie," Mark says, as he chuckles.

Suddenly you notice a flash go off. You quickly look up and notice that Mendi as a camera in her hands. You blush at the idea of being in a picture. Then she snaps another one, catching you blushing.

"Better but him in bed," Mendi says, as she grins at your blush. She puts the camera away and moves to pick Zack up.

"I got it," you say, as you, carefully, pick Zack up and, slowly, stand up. However, before you can take a step, another flash goes up. Zack buries his head in your chest to get away from the flash. You don't look up, but just walk towards Zack's room. (Don't want to risk Mendi getting another picture of your blush.)

"Night kiddo," you say, as you put Zack in his bed. You get up to walk away when Mark and Mendi come in and kiss Zack good night.

You begin to walk to your room, remembering when your parents would do that. You open your door when, suddenly, you get tackled from behind. Whatever tackled you causes you and it to fall into the room.

"Did you think we would forget about you?" Mendi asks, as she helps you up. "Mark, you go first."

"Alright," Mark says, as he hugs you. "Night, kiddo."

You blush bright red, caught completely off guard. You suddenly have a flashback to when your dad used to do the same thing Mark's doing now. You remember how you would hug back with all your strength (which being, a five year old, you didn't have much). Your hands twitch very slightly and you, unconsciously, wrap your arms around Marks waist. You lower your head onto his shoulder without thinking about it. Mendi comes up beside you and wraps her arms around the two of you.

Just as suddenly as Mendi tackling you, you start to feel sleepy. With your head against Mark's shoulder, you start to fall asleep.

-----------------------------------------------------
Mark's P.O.V.

(IYNH) surprised me when he wrapped his arms around my waist and put his head on my shoulder. I start to feel him relax when Mendi wraps her arms around us. His breathing starts to slow. I instantly realize that he fell asleep.

Without me having to say anything, Mendi backs away from us. I pick (IYNH) up as Mendi pulls his blanket back. I lower (IYNH) onto his bed and stand back up, as Mendi tucks him in.

"Sweet dreams, (IYNH)," Mendi says, as she kisses him on his forehead. (IYNH) smiles slightly in his sleep. Then he says something I never thought I would hear him say for a while.

"Good...night...mommy," (IYNH) whispers, in his sleep.

I could practically see Mendi's eyes welling up in tears. I place a hand on her shoulder and escort her out of the room. (The only way i was going to get her to let (IYNH) sleep now.) I can't help but look back and smile at (IYNH) though. He's starting to feel a place in our family and it made me feel good.

As you release Zack's wrist and the pan, Zack looks at you with fear and worry. As you shut off the stove, you look at your right hand and asses the damage done to it. The area that should be burned is already a light pink, healing much faster than it should on a normal human being.

"(IYNH)!" Mendi yells in worry and a panic, as she and Mark rushes into the kitchen. Her panic worries Zack further, making him look as if he is going to cry.

"Let me see," Mark says. His voice is calm but there is worry in it and in his eyes.

"It's alright," you say, hiding your hand behind you. 'What will they think if they see that it is already healing?' you think.

"Let me see," Mark repeats. His voice is stern, but still holds worry for you.

You remember when your parents would speak to you like that. It was usually because you wouldn't let them help you with something. You decided from a young age that you hated that tone of voice. So, to stop from hearing it, you became what parents would call a "good boy." You did whatever they told you with no hesitation.

So it was more of an instinct than a habit when you stretched your hand out to Mark, palm down.

"(IYNH), I'm sorry," Mendi says, as Mark takes you hand, gently but firmly, and flips your hand over. "I must have left the stove on. I'm so sorry."

At this point, the pink on your hand is fading into your skin's normal color. It is at this point that you notice Zack looks scared, worried and lost, too.

1521311.content:
(I hope,that i'm doing this right.)
Wanna know how I got raised in a family of Pokemon.Well,long story short,I was a 5-year old boy,got lost,fainted,woke up in a home,then got accepted as a son/brother.So,yeah...
I had not fully awaken from my sleep,for I have my eyes close,my covers pulled over my shoulders,and my head buried in my fluffy pillow,hoping my eyes are not exposed to sunlight.I don't feel like getting up,this early in morning,but i'm not lazy,if that's what your thinking.
"*Ugh...why can't the sun wait?*"I thought to myself,trying to go to sleep.I lifted up my pillow a tiny bit,so that I could see the clock...7:35.
"Come on.It's the summer,and i'm only 13."I groaned.I shifted in bed,which I got into a more comfortable spot...when all of a sudden...
"GET UP,GET UP,LAZY BUTT!!"A voice squealed,as the door slung open,and the loud banging noises on the pan,made me fall over onto the floor,out of surprise.That high-pitched squeal...was my one sisters...both anthro Misdeavus.One has a plump body,having a wide hips and chest,and stubby arms.You won't be able to see legs,unless you look closely at her cloaked body,which her name is Minda,by the way.That one is the one that woke me up.The other one has a more normal frame,a decent chest,and also have stubby arms.Her cloak was more like Minda's,only that she likes to stay on the ground,more than float in the air,which her name is Mandy,by the way.
"Ugh...can you please,give me another hour,before you startle someone like that?"I growled,pulling myself up,back into my bed,and pulling my covers over my head,quickly having them yanked off.
"No,no,no.Get up!Mr.Lazy pants!"Minda said,yanking on my hair.
"Alright,alright!I'm up,i'm up!"I screamed,quickly stomping into the bathroom.The first thing I checked was my body.
Good...everything is in place.I have black,rebel style hair,tanned skin,sky blue eyes,and a normal body frame,for a boy.I was also around 4'08",double the height of my sisters,but not as tall as my mom.After inspecting my body,I picked up my toothbrush,put toothpaste on it,and started brushing my teeth.After that...I just left back into my room.I quickly peeked into my room,not seeing Minda there.
"Good..."I said,under my breath,walking to my closet,and choosing my clothes.The ones I like the best,are my black and blue stripped hoodie shirt,and black pants,with a diamond pattern on the left leg.After getting dressed,I walked down the stairs and headed towards the kitchen.Me and my family lived in a three story mansion,if you count the lower floors,that we like to call the basement.Minda flew past me a blinding speeds.
"Come on slowpoke!They're already at the park!Race ya there!"She screamed,phasing through a wall.
"At 7 in the morning?Wow,people do adjust quickly..."I said,running through the kitchen,and heading out the screen door,quickly catching up to Minda.
"Minda,if everyone's at the park,how come you stayed behind?"I asked.
"Because,our mom told me to stay behind,to wake you up."Minda sighed,floating backwards,and rolling her eyes.
"That sounds like our mom...by the way...tree."She turned around,and instantly flew into a tree,which I soon had the head.Don't worry,she's fine.
"Real funny,Jake."Minda growled,as she caught back up to me,with a red mark on her face.I laughed,as we continued our way to the park.
1521311.title: The unusual family...

15213111.content:
After about 3 more minutes of running,I could see the park up ahead.Not only that,I could see my mom,fooling around like a little kid.
If it isn't obvious,my mom is a Mismagius anthro.She stands at 5'05",and has a plump figure.She has a wider bust and hips than Minda,but has a normal sized waist.She also has,what I like to call,a second piece of the cloak she's wearing.It was a darker shade of purple,and it poured out from the original one,almost in a heart shape,if you look at her from behind.She is very smart,because she can use those cloak extensions as hands,but she doesn't like to show off her genius side too much.Right now,she is hanging upside down on the monkey bars,and Mandy is trying to convince her to get down.Did I forget to mention Mandy has a sweet nature?
"Mom!Get down,before you you hurt yourself!"I yelled,which I caught both the attention of my mom,and Mandy.My mom's name is Malinda,by the way.Strange how they all have an M and an a in their names.
"Well,looks who telling who to get off the bars,before they get hurt.Thanks for getting him awake,Minda."Malinda said,crossing her arms.
"Good to see you're awake,Jake."Mandy said,smiling.
"Told you he was slow."Minda said.
"Blah!You girls have naturally fast speeds.How am I suppose to compete with that?"I complained.
"Alright,just don't get your hair in a bunch."Minda then sat on my head.Luckily,all my family members are very light.
"Yeah,you girls have fun,while I go play with the ducks."I then started walking towards the pond,which Minda got off my head.
"Remember,if anybody comes,we're at home,okay!?"Mandy reminded me.
"Okay!"I replied,sitting near the pond.I then looked down into the pond,trying to see if there is any fish I could try to catch.There are many fishes and frogs living in the pond,but they rarely come out in the mornings.Apparently,I see one thing moving in the water,in a swaying motion.I quickly realized it's a dogfish,so I decided to ignore it,because I don't like those fish.
"Quack,quack,quack."I looked forward,seeing that the ducks were making that noise.They are pretty average,for ducks.
"Pfft...quack."I said,paying my attention to the pond.
*******************
It's been like...an hour,and I still haven't seen a single fish.I started to get really bored,so I decided to move my hand in a circle around the pond.
"*Ugh...no fish...good fish,I suppose.*"I thought,heading back to the playground.I only saw my family,playing around the playground,more noticeably,my mom.She is swinging around in a circle,on the swing set,which brings up to question: is she breaking the laws of physics,or is she just lightweight?
"Okay...mom,can we go back home now?"I asked my mom,as I approached the swing she was on.She instantly stopped.
"What!?Why?"She asked.
"Dude,it's been like 10 minutes."Minda said.
"Actually,it's been an hour."Me and Mandy said.
"Anyways,there is nothing to do here,and--"Instantly,we heard little kids running in this direction,which we all shivered in response.
"Kids are coming."I finished.
"Last one to the house,is a rotten bug!"Malinda squealed,as she instantly vanished.Minda did the same,which proves my point,about them having natural speediness.
"Alright,Mandy,let's go."I said,crouching down,so she could climb onto my back.After she did,I started running where my other relatives flew off,which is the direction of my home.
**********************
I had forgotten,that my home is past the city,which I think is a bad thing.Many people think that I am a human,and that my family has been mutated into Pokemon,due to my mother's convincing techniques.
"I think we should get out of here,pronto."I whispered,putting my hands inside my pockets,which I could hear girls giggling.
"Stop worrying your little head,Jake.Our mom already convinced the town,that we are mutated."Minda said,who was sitting on my head,backwards.
"It's not that,it's just that our mom moves,too lustfully."I was right,Malinda is swinging her hips with almost every step she takes!
"But mom promised,she won't marry any man."Mandy said,who was walking beside me.
"Oh yeah,I forgot...but still,I think that's too much,for a promise."We only have a mother,because she did give birth to Mandy and Minda,but she was raped,and she didn't force herself to marrying the guy.
"Don't sweat it,she always keep her promise,no matter how much a man is attractive."Minda said,as she shifted on my head,so she was sitting forward.
"Besides,I think the girls are starting to like you around here."
"I think the girls are giggling,because mom is swinging her hips,like crazy."
15213111.title: The Childish mother...

152131111.content:
"Reload..."Malinda said,as Minda put another tomato on a spoon.Right now,we were in the kitchen,eating breakfast...but unfortunately,Malinda is trying to hit one of her experiments.I don't know why,but she absolutely hated the small living skeleton,that dances as it moves.Minda nor Mandy knows why she hates it.Malinda then flung her spoon,which sent the tomato flying across the room,and hitting the skeleton straight in the face,and making it fall on the floor.
"Nice shot!"Minda said.She enjoys watching mom hate on the skeleton.
"Mom,can you please,get over your hatred of that skeleton?"Mandy asked politely.
"NEVER!That thing is annoying,and worst of all,it can't even stay down!"Malinda yelled.Just then the living skeleton jumped on the table and started dancing.
"Well,you got a point there."I said,as I flicked it off the table.
"If I had a metal hammer,I would kill it."She said.
"Well,besides the skeleton,can't we have a normal breakfast?"I asked,still chewing on my cereal.
"Sure Jake--"The skeleton came back,but this time,it danced in front of Malinda's face.
"If this skeleton could die!"Malinda then pulled out a wooden mallet,which the skeleton started running in fear.Her hat is like a giant storing case...which proves my point of saying that she is very smart.She then chased it out of the kitchen,with Minda following behind her,laughing her brains out.Me and Mandy just sighed,at our mother's rage.
"So,Mandy,ever find out why she truly hates the skeleton?"I said,placing my bowl into the sink.
"No,but she said that she created about 10 years ago...and she still hates it today."Mandy said biting onto her necklace.As you may have read,they do eat fears they collect in their necklaces,but feeding on only fears,does not satisfy hunger that much.However,she has a small stomach,and her necklace can carry many more fears than a regular one could...so,anybody who had a scare that would pee their pants,would probably feed her for like a month.
"Blah...also,why do you have a skinner body frame than your sister?"
"Minda was kinda gluttonous,when she was younger."
"And I have a better frame than you!"Minda yelled,as she slammed her stubby arms onto the table.
"Am I unattractive or something!?I have the same figure as my mom,and--"
"Minda,we weren't worried about your figure,we were just chatting about how she has a skinner frame then you,since you both have a mother with an hourglass figure."I said.
"Oh...well...uh...okay,then..."She said,as she slowly floated upwards,and phased through the ceiling.
"By the way,we should go to the store to see,if her order of spiders came in yet."Mandy said.
"You're right!Let's go!"I said,as Mandy climbed on my back,and I ran towards the store,in a Megaman style.

I woke up suddenly in the middle of the night. Or, I think it was night. It was pretty bright. And foggy. I sat up and shaded my eyes. It was almost like the sun was in my room! I felt pretty week and I wobbled out of bed. I opened my eyes once again to realize that it wasn't morning, there was a fire! My house was on fire! I quickly started crawling across the floor, covering my mouth and nose as I inched across the floor. I soon made it to the stairs and slid down them to the bottom. I started coughing and my eyes were watering due to the heat and musky smoke. I reached the door and reached for the handle.
"Oww!" I winced as my hand burned at the touch. I franticly started searching for a way out. I crawled to the window and tried to break it, but I was too weak to break it. I started to cry, because I knew if I couldn't break it there was no hope for me. Just as I gave my final weak blow, I flew through the window onto the grass and went out cold.

Funny to think that for most of their childhood, Goomys and Sliggo go are naked until they evolve into Goodra, and then they have to get used to wearing clothes. You grab your backpack and head down stairs to the kitchen for breakfast.

You see your brother waiting at the counter in his seat, jiggling back and forth. You see your dad finishing up making breakfast. Being a Goodra he is pretty tall, and very wide, even for a Goodra. He has a unique colorization of light and dark green, and his eyes have star like pupils. He serves you and your brother your breakfast. "Eat up now, both of you!" He says with a smile, he then looks over and leans in to ask "did you..." you nod before he finishes his sentence, as you and he have been planing in the event that he does evolve at school, as you always had prepared a shirt and pants for him once he had started middle school. He nods and breaths a sigh of relief, "well, it's better safe than sorry." he says, turning around to grab something, and you notice he is wearing no pants... again, netting you a good look at his expansive rear. Your brother snickers at this. Your dad also laughs as well, "sorry, I had just gotten up as well, so I could only get my shirt on. And don't laugh too much son, once you evolve you will have to deal with the fact you have to cloth yourself, and that your rear will end up as big, if not bigger, than mine." You nod just before he looks at you, letting him breath another sigh of relief. You both finish eating breakfast, and now you are getting ready to head to school. "Hang on, hang on, I'll drive you there, and I'll pick you guys up after school." Your dad says while he is trying to get his pants on. "Ok then dad!" Your brother responds, knowing that today has got to be the day he evolves.

You arrive at school 25 minutes earlier than if you two went by bus. "Have a nice day!" your father yells out as he drives off. Your school is a basic two story school, though it is confusing to walk through. You both buy some snacks so the first two periods you both aren't starving by the time lunch rolls around. On your way to class, your brother stops in his... erm... trail? ahh... never mind. He stops following you, tuning his antennas toward the nearest window, which is far from where you two are. "What's wrong?" you ask. "It's raining." your brother responds with a smirk on his face. You sigh and give a face, tired of his enthusiasm every time it rains. "Oh don't give me that look, You, Me, and Dad are very sure that today is the day I evolve." You silently damn his ability to see clearly with is radar system and continue walking to your first class, which is...
